zero_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/-- The square with `0 : 0 ⟶ 0` on the top and `𝟙 X` on the bottom is a pushout square. -/
@[simp]
theorem zero_top (X : C) : IsPushout (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 0) (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 X) (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 X) ((«expr𝟙») X) :=
  (zero_left X).flip
#align zero_top zero_top
zero_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/-- The square with `0 : 0 ⟶ 0` on the right and `𝟙 X` on the left is a pushout square. -/
@[simp]
theorem zero_right (X : C) : IsPushout (0 : «expr ⟶ » X 0) ((«expr𝟙») X) (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 0) (0 : «expr ⟶ » X 0) :=
  { w := by simp
    is_colimit' :=
      ⟨{  desc := fun s => 0
          fac' := fun s =>
            by
            have c :=
              @pushout_cocone.coequalizer_ext _ _ _ _ _ _ _ s _ 0 ((«expr𝟙») _) (by simp)
                (by simpa using pushout_cocone.condition s)
            dsimp at c
            simpa using c }⟩ }
#align zero_right zero_right
zero_left:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≪≫ » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/-- The square with `0 : 0 ⟶ 0` on the right left `𝟙 X` on the right is a pushout square. -/
@[simp]
theorem zero_left (X : C) : IsPushout (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 X) (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 0) ((«expr𝟙») X) (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 X) :=
  of_iso_pushout (by simp) («expr ≪≫ » (coprodZeroIso X).symm (pushoutZeroZeroIso _ _).symm) (by simp) (by simp)
#align zero_left zero_left
zero_bot:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/-- The square with `0 : 0 ⟶ 0` on the bottom and `𝟙 X` on the top is a pushout square. -/
@[simp]
theorem zero_bot (X : C) : IsPushout ((«expr𝟙») X) (0 : «expr ⟶ » X 0) (0 : «expr ⟶ » X 0) (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 0) :=
  (zero_right X).flip
#align zero_bot zero_bot
unop:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem unop {Z X Y P : «expr ᵒᵖ» C} {f : «expr ⟶ » Z X} {g : «expr ⟶ » Z Y} {inl : «expr ⟶ » X P} {inr : «expr ⟶ » Y P}
    (h : IsPushout f g inl inr) : IsPullback inr.unop inl.unop g.unop f.unop :=
  IsPullback.of_isLimit
    (IsLimit.ofIsoLimit (Limits.PushoutCocone.isColimitEquivIsLimitUnop h.flip.cocone h.flip.is_colimit)
      h.to_comm_sq.flip.cocone_unop)
#align unop unop
paste_vert_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem paste_vert_iff {X₁₁ X₁₂ X₂₁ X₂₂ X₃₁ X₃₂ : C} {h₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₁₂} {h₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₂₂}
    {h₃₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₃₁ X₃₂} {v₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₂₁} {v₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₂₂} {v₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₃₁}
    {v₂₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₂ X₃₂} (s : IsPushout h₁₁ v₁₁ v₁₂ h₂₁) (e : «expr ≫ » h₂₁ v₂₂ = «expr ≫ » v₂₁ h₃₁) :
    IsPushout h₁₁ («expr ≫ » v₁₁ v₂₁) («expr ≫ » v₁₂ v₂₂) h₃₁ ↔ IsPushout h₂₁ v₂₁ v₂₂ h₃₁ :=
  ⟨fun h => h.of_bot e s, s.paste_vert⟩
#align paste_vert_iff paste_vert_iff
paste_vert:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
-- Objects here are arranged in a 3x2 grid, and indexed by their xy coordinates.
-- Morphisms are named `hᵢⱼ` for a horizontal morphism starting at `(i,j)`,
-- and `vᵢⱼ` for a vertical morphism starting at `(i,j)`.
/-- Paste two pushout squares "vertically" to obtain another pushout square. -/
theorem paste_vert {X₁₁ X₁₂ X₂₁ X₂₂ X₃₁ X₃₂ : C} {h₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₁₂} {h₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₂₂}
    {h₃₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₃₁ X₃₂} {v₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₂₁} {v₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₂₂} {v₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₃₁}
    {v₂₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₂ X₃₂} (s : IsPushout h₁₁ v₁₁ v₁₂ h₂₁) (t : IsPushout h₂₁ v₂₁ v₂₂ h₃₁) :
    IsPushout h₁₁ («expr ≫ » v₁₁ v₂₁) («expr ≫ » v₁₂ v₂₂) h₃₁ :=
  of_isColimit (bigSquareIsPushout _ _ _ _ _ _ _ s.w t.w t.is_colimit s.is_colimit)
#align paste_vert paste_vert
paste_horiz_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem paste_horiz_iff {X₁₁ X₁₂ X₁₃ X₂₁ X₂₂ X₂₃ : C} {h₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₁₂} {h₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₁₃}
    {h₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₂₂} {h₂₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₂ X₂₃} {v₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₂₁} {v₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₂₂}
    {v₁₃ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₃ X₂₃} (s : IsPushout h₁₁ v₁₁ v₁₂ h₂₁) (e : «expr ≫ » h₁₂ v₁₃ = «expr ≫ » v₁₂ h₂₂) :
    IsPushout («expr ≫ » h₁₁ h₁₂) v₁₁ v₁₃ («expr ≫ » h₂₁ h₂₂) ↔ IsPushout h₁₂ v₁₂ v₁₃ h₂₂ :=
  ⟨fun h => h.of_right e s, s.paste_horiz⟩
#align paste_horiz_iff paste_horiz_iff
paste_horiz:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- Paste two pushout squares "horizontally" to obtain another pushout square. -/
theorem paste_horiz {X₁₁ X₁₂ X₁₃ X₂₁ X₂₂ X₂₃ : C} {h₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₁₂} {h₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₁₃}
    {h₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₂₂} {h₂₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₂ X₂₃} {v₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₂₁} {v₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₂₂}
    {v₁₃ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₃ X₂₃} (s : IsPushout h₁₁ v₁₁ v₁₂ h₂₁) (t : IsPushout h₁₂ v₁₂ v₁₃ h₂₂) :
    IsPushout («expr ≫ » h₁₁ h₁₂) v₁₁ v₁₃ («expr ≫ » h₂₁ h₂₂) :=
  (paste_vert s.flip t.flip).flip
#align paste_horiz paste_horiz
op:
theorem op (h : IsPushout f g inl inr) : IsPullback inr.op inl.op g.op f.op :=
  IsPullback.of_isLimit
    (IsLimit.ofIsoLimit (Limits.PushoutCocone.isColimitEquivIsLimitOp h.flip.cocone h.flip.is_colimit)
      h.to_comm_sq.flip.cocone_op)
#align op op
of_vert_is_iso:
theorem of_vert_is_iso [IsIso g] [IsIso inl] (sq : CommSq f g inl inr) : IsPushout f g inl inr :=
  (of_horiz_isIso sq.flip).flip
#align of_vert_is_iso of_vert_is_iso
of_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- Given a pushout square assembled from a pushout square on the left and
a commuting square on the right, the right square is a pushout square. -/
theorem of_right {X₁₁ X₁₂ X₁₃ X₂₁ X₂₂ X₂₃ : C} {h₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₁₂} {h₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₁₃}
    {h₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₂₂} {h₂₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₂ X₂₃} {v₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₂₁} {v₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₂₂}
    {v₁₃ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₃ X₂₃} (s : IsPushout («expr ≫ » h₁₁ h₁₂) v₁₁ v₁₃ («expr ≫ » h₂₁ h₂₂))
    (p : «expr ≫ » h₁₂ v₁₃ = «expr ≫ » v₁₂ h₂₂) (t : IsPushout h₁₁ v₁₁ v₁₂ h₂₁) : IsPushout h₁₂ v₁₂ v₁₃ h₂₂ :=
  (of_bot s.flip p.symm t.flip).flip
#align of_right of_right
of_map_of_faithful:
theorem is_pushout.of_map_of_faithful [ReflectsColimit (span f g) F] [Faithful F]
    (H : IsPushout (F.map f) (F.map g) (F.map h) (F.map i)) : IsPushout f g h i :=
  H.of_map F (F.map_injective <| by simpa only [F.map_comp] using H.w)
#align is_pushout.of_map_of_faithful is_pushout.of_map_of_faithful
of_map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem is_pushout.of_map [ReflectsColimit (span f g) F] (e : «expr ≫ » f h = «expr ≫ » g i)
    (H : IsPushout (F.map f) (F.map g) (F.map h) (F.map i)) : IsPushout f g h i :=
  by
  refine' ⟨⟨e⟩, ⟨is_colimit_of_reflects F <| _⟩⟩
  refine' (is_colimit.equiv_of_nat_iso_of_iso (span_comp_iso F f g) _ _ (walking_span.ext _ _ _)).symm H.is_colimit
  exacts[iso.refl _, (category.comp_id _).trans (category.id_comp _), (category.comp_id _).trans (category.id_comp _)]
#align is_pushout.of_map is_pushout.of_map
of_iso_pushout:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem of_iso_pushout (h : CommSq f g inl inr) [HasPushout f g] (i : «expr ≅ » P (pushout f g))
    (w₁ : «expr ≫ » inl i.hom = pushout.inl) (w₂ : «expr ≫ » inr i.hom = pushout.inr) : IsPushout f g inl inr :=
  of_isColimit' h
    (Limits.IsColimit.ofIsoColimit (colimit.isColimit _)
      (@PushoutCocone.ext _ _ _ _ _ _ _ (PushoutCocone.mk _ _ _) _ i w₁ w₂).symm)
#align of_iso_pushout of_iso_pushout
of_iso_pullback:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem of_iso_pullback (h : CommSq fst snd f g) [HasPullback f g] (i : «expr ≅ » P (pullback f g))
    (w₁ : «expr ≫ » i.hom pullback.fst = fst) (w₂ : «expr ≫ » i.hom pullback.snd = snd) : IsPullback fst snd f g :=
  of_isLimit' h
    (Limits.IsLimit.ofIsoLimit (limit.isLimit _)
      (@PullbackCone.ext _ _ _ _ _ _ _ (PullbackCone.mk _ _ _) _ i w₁.symm w₂.symm).symm)
#align of_iso_pullback of_iso_pullback
of_is_pullback_is_pushout:
theorem of_is_pullback_is_pushout (p₁ : IsPullback f g h i) (p₂ : IsPushout f g h i) : BicartesianSq f g h i :=
  bicartesian_sq.mk p₁.to_comm_sq ⟨p₁.is_limit⟩ ⟨p₂.is_colimit⟩
#align of_is_pullback_is_pushout of_is_pullback_is_pushout
of_is_product':
/-- A variant of `of_is_product` that is more useful with `apply`. -/
theorem of_is_product' (h : Limits.IsLimit (BinaryFan.mk fst snd)) (t : IsTerminal Z) :
    IsPullback fst snd (t.from _) (t.from _) :=
  of_is_product h t
#align of_is_product' of_is_product'
of_is_product:
/-- If `c` is a limiting binary product cone, and we have a terminal object,
then we have `is_pullback c.fst c.snd 0 0`
(where each `0` is the unique morphism to the terminal object). -/
theorem of_is_product {c : BinaryFan X Y} (h : Limits.IsLimit c) (t : IsTerminal Z) :
    IsPullback c.fst c.snd (t.from _) (t.from _) :=
  of_isLimit
    (isPullbackOfIsTerminalIsProduct _ _ _ _ t
      (IsLimit.ofIsoLimit h
        (Limits.Cones.ext (Iso.refl c.X)
          (by
            rintro ⟨⟨⟩⟩ <;>
              · dsimp
                simp))))
#align of_is_product of_is_product
of_is_limit':
/-- A variant of `of_is_limit` that is more useful with `apply`. -/
theorem of_is_limit' (w : CommSq fst snd f g) (h : Limits.IsLimit w.cone) : IsPullback fst snd f g :=
  of_isLimit h
#align of_is_limit' of_is_limit'
of_is_limit:
/-- If `c` is a limiting pullback cone, then we have a `is_pullback c.fst c.snd f g`. -/
theorem of_is_limit {c : PullbackCone f g} (h : Limits.IsLimit c) : IsPullback c.fst c.snd f g :=
  { w := c.condition
    is_limit' := ⟨IsLimit.ofIsoLimit h (Limits.PullbackCone.ext (Iso.refl _) (by tidy) (by tidy))⟩ }
#align of_is_limit of_is_limit
of_is_coproduct':
/-- A variant of `of_is_coproduct` that is more useful with `apply`. -/
theorem of_is_coproduct' (h : Limits.IsColimit (BinaryCofan.mk inl inr)) (t : IsInitial Z) :
    IsPushout (t.to _) (t.to _) inl inr :=
  of_is_coproduct h t
#align of_is_coproduct' of_is_coproduct'
of_is_coproduct:
/-- If `c` is a colimiting binary coproduct cocone, and we have an initial object,
then we have `is_pushout 0 0 c.inl c.inr`
(where each `0` is the unique morphism from the initial object). -/
theorem of_is_coproduct {c : BinaryCofan X Y} (h : Limits.IsColimit c) (t : IsInitial Z) :
    IsPushout (t.to _) (t.to _) c.inl c.inr :=
  of_isColimit
    (isPushoutOfIsInitialIsCoproduct _ _ _ _ t
      (IsColimit.ofIsoColimit h
        (Limits.Cocones.ext (Iso.refl c.X)
          (by
            rintro ⟨⟨⟩⟩ <;>
              · dsimp
                simp))))
#align of_is_coproduct of_is_coproduct
of_is_colimit':
/-- A variant of `of_is_colimit` that is more useful with `apply`. -/
theorem of_is_colimit' (w : CommSq f g inl inr) (h : Limits.IsColimit w.cocone) : IsPushout f g inl inr :=
  of_isColimit h

/-- If `c` is a colimiting pushout cocone, then we have a `is_pushout f g c.inl c.inr`. -/
theorem of_is_colimit {c : PushoutCocone f g} (h : Limits.IsColimit c) : IsPushout f g c.inl c.inr :=
  { w := c.condition
    is_colimit' := ⟨IsColimit.ofIsoColimit h (Limits.PushoutCocone.ext (Iso.refl _) (by tidy) (by tidy))⟩ }
#align of_is_colimit of_is_colimit

   v            v

is a bicartesian square.

    BicartesianSq (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 X) (0 : «expr ⟶ » 0 Y) b.inl b.inr :=
  of_isPullback_isPushout (IsPullback.of_is_bilimit' h) (IsPushout.of_isBilimit h)

    BicartesianSq b.fst b.snd (0 : «expr ⟶ » X 0) (0 : «expr ⟶ » Y 0) :=

theorem of_horiz_is_iso [IsIso f] [IsIso inr] (sq : CommSq f g inl inr) : IsPushout f g inl inr :=
  of_isColimit' sq
    (by
      refine' pushout_cocone.is_colimit.mk _ (fun s => «expr ≫ » (inv inr) s.inr) (fun s => _) (by tidy) (by tidy)
      simp only [← cancel_epi f, s.condition, sq.w_assoc, is_iso.hom_inv_id_assoc])

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- Given a pushout square assembled from a pushout square on the top and
a commuting square on the bottom, the bottom square is a pushout square. -/
theorem of_bot {X₁₁ X₁₂ X₂₁ X₂₂ X₃₁ X₃₂ : C} {h₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₁₂} {h₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₂₂}
    {h₃₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₃₁ X₃₂} {v₁₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₁ X₂₁} {v₁₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₁₂ X₂₂} {v₂₁ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₁ X₃₁}
    {v₂₂ : «expr ⟶ » X₂₂ X₃₂} (s : IsPushout h₁₁ («expr ≫ » v₁₁ v₂₁) («expr ≫ » v₁₂ v₂₂) h₃₁)
    (p : «expr ≫ » h₂₁ v₂₂ = «expr ≫ » v₂₁ h₃₁) (t : IsPushout h₁₁ v₁₁ v₁₂ h₂₁) : IsPushout h₂₁ v₂₁ v₂₂ h₃₁ :=
  of_isColimit (rightSquareIsPushout _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ p t.is_colimit s.is_colimit)
#align of_bot of_bot
map_is_pushout:
theorem functor.map_is_pushout [PreservesColimit (span f g) F] (s : IsPushout f g h i) :
    IsPushout (F.map f) (F.map g) (F.map h) (F.map i) :=
  by
  refine'
    is_pushout.of_is_colimit' (F.map_comm_sq s.to_comm_sq)
      (is_colimit.equiv_of_nat_iso_of_iso (span_comp_iso F f g) _ _ (walking_span.ext _ _ _)
        (is_colimit_of_preserves F s.is_colimit))
  · rfl
  · dsimp
    simp
  · dsimp
    simp
#align functor.map_is_pushout functor.map_is_pushout
map_is_pullback:
theorem functor.map_is_pullback [PreservesLimit (cospan h i) F] (s : IsPullback f g h i) :
    IsPullback (F.map f) (F.map g) (F.map h) (F.map i) :=
  by
  -- This is made slightly awkward because `C` and `D` have different universes,
  -- and so the relevant `walking_cospan` diagrams live in different universes too!
  refine'
    is_pullback.of_is_limit' (F.map_comm_sq s.to_comm_sq)
      (is_limit.equiv_of_nat_iso_of_iso (cospan_comp_iso F h i) _ _ (walking_cospan.ext _ _ _)
        (is_limit_of_preserves F s.is_limit))
  · rfl
  · dsimp
    simp
  · dsimp
    simp
#align functor.map_is_pullback functor.map_is_pullback
map_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem is_pushout.map_iff {D : Type _} [Category D] (F : «expr ⥤ » C D) [PreservesColimit (span f g) F]
    [ReflectsColimit (span f g) F] (e : «expr ≫ » f h = «expr ≫ » g i) :
    IsPushout (F.map f) (F.map g) (F.map h) (F.map i) ↔ IsPushout f g h i :=
  ⟨fun h => h.of_map F e, fun h => h.map F⟩
#align is_pushout.map_iff is_pushout.map_iff

flip_iff:
theorem flip_iff : IsPushout f g inl inr ↔ IsPushout g f inr inl :=
  ⟨flip, flip⟩
#align flip_iff flip_iff
flip:
#print flip /-
theorem flip (p : BicartesianSq f g h i) : BicartesianSq g f i h :=
  of_isPullback_isPushout p.to_is_pullback.flip p.to_is_pushout.flip
#align flip flip
-/

theorem cone_snd (h : IsPullback fst snd f g) : h.cone.snd = snd :=
  rfl
#align cone_snd cone_snd

@[simp]
theorem cone_fst (h : IsPullback fst snd f g) : h.cone.fst = fst :=
  rfl
#align cone_fst cone_fst
